Senior Friendship Centers holding drive-thru hurricane-prep meal kit distribution
item.description: Organizers and volunteers will be on-site from 10 a.m. to noon on Wednesday.

item.title: Caiden Lee embracing challenges that come with senior year on & off the football field
item.description: This week’s ABC7 Athlete of the Week is Parrish Community High School’s Caiden Lee. He’s a senior offensive lineman for the Bulls.

item.title: Rain chances going down a bit
item.description: Although there will be some slightly drier air moving in on Wednesday we will still see a few scattered storms.

item.title: Manatee County set to make final decision for the next superintendent of schools
item.description: The board’s vote is scheduled for Tuesday evening.

item.title: ‘Florida’s Treasure Hunt,’ Are you one of the millions who could have unclaimed money?
item.description: If no one claims them after a few years, the items go up for auction.

item.title: Road sign changes erasing Gulf of Mexico references on Longboat Key
item.description: The main road through the key, State Road 789, is still Gulf of Mexico Drive -- for now.

item.title: Former USF coach Jim Leavitt faces charges after fight with ex-girlfriend, police say
item.description: Leavitt, 68, was arrested Monday night after a fight at a St. Petersburg apartment complex.

item.title: Laurie Breslin is unanimous choice for manatee school superintendent
item.description: Dr. Laurie Breslin was the school board’s unanimous choice.

item.title: Overnight shooting in Bradenton claims life of 15-year-old, police say
item.description: Officers responded to a shooting at 11:28 p.m.
